short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to convert compelte LinkedIn profile to PDF

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkedIn Profile Complete PDF allows you to download a PDF copy of your complete profile including the hidden sections in your profile such as certifications which are generally not visible, it downloads all sections of the profile regardless of its importance to LinkedIn.

Steps to download PDF:
1. Install it.
2. Go to LinkedIn and Logout (Click the arrow next to "Me" and click on Logout)
3. Now Google Search "{Your Name} LinkedIn".
4. Click on the item with your profile.
5. Make sure that you cancel the Auto-Login by Google on the top-left corner by clicking 'x' or Cancel.
6. If the page blocks that Login is needed, then clear the cache for that day. You can clear the cache by clicking three dots on the top-left, clicking "Download browsing data.." and then click "Delete data".
7. Once the page is open, click Extensions button (jigsaw puzzle-shaped button) and click this extension button).
8. Give it 5 seconds, a Print to PDF dialog should open up.
